data.name: Welcome to Empyreum Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Empyreum is a local co-op party game up to 4 players. The main goal is to organize and clean numerous floors of the hotel with mechanics involving everyday chores (vacuuming or making the bed), and crazy tasks like taking care of alien babies and chasing ghosts away!

In this demo, players can choose their favourite character to venture for the first time into three floors of the mysterious hotel, explore the reception, chat with the guests... And, most importantly, leave the rooms squeaky clean!

Furthermore, if the players cooperate to do their best, they may find a few hidden surprises...
